levels.health_implications: Air quality is satisfactory for the general population
Air quality is acceptable for most people
levels.cautionary_statement: Unusually sensitive people should consider reducing prolonged outdoor exertion

levels.description: Air quality is acceptable for most
levels.health_implications: Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects
levels.cautionary_statement: Active children and adults, and people with respiratory disease should limit prolonged outdoor exertion

levels.health_implications: Everyone may begin to experience health effects
levels.cautionary_statement: Active children and adults, and people with respiratory disease should avoid prolonged outdoor exertion
Everyone should avoid all outdoor exertion

levels.health_implications: Health alert: everyone may experience serious health effects
levels.cautionary_statement: Everyone should avoid all outdoor exertion; stay indoors with windows closed

levels.health_implications: Air quality is satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk
Air quality is acceptable for most people
levels.cautionary_statement: Unusually sensitive people should consider reducing prolonged outdoor exertion

levels.description: Sensitive groups may experience health effects
levels.health_implications: Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects
levels.cautionary_statement: Active children and adults, and people with respiratory disease should limit prolonged outdoor exertion

levels.health_implications: Everyone may begin to experience health effects
levels.cautionary_statement: Active children and adults, and people with respiratory disease should avoid prolonged outdoor exertion; everyone else should limit prolonged outdoor exertion
Active children and adults, and people with respiratory disease should avoid all outdoor exertion; everyone else should limit outdoor exertion

levels.health_implications: Everyone may experience serious health effects
levels.cautionary_statement: Everyone should avoid all outdoor exertion

levels.protection: No protection required. You can safely stay outside
Seek shade during midday hours. Wear sunscreen and a hat
Reduce time in the sun between 10am-4pm. Wear protective clothing, sunscreen, and sunglasses
Minimize sun exposure between 10am-4pm. Protective clothing, sunscreen SPF 30+, and sunglasses essential
Avoid sun exposure between 10am-4pm. Protective clothing, sunscreen SPF 50+, and sunglasses required

pollen_levels.name: Pollen Concentration
pollen_levels.note: Pollen data available for Europe only

levels.description: Pollen levels are moderate; allergy sufferers may experience symptoms
Pollen levels are high; most allergy sufferers will experience symptoms
Pollen levels are very high; all allergy sufferers will experience symptoms
